Pterodactyl API.Description: A websocket implementation for the pterodactyl server console.

Website Blocks.customXML: <category name="Website" colour="195"><label text="Start website"></label><block type="website_start"><value name="port"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3000</field></shadow></value></block><label text="On request"></label><block type="website_path"><value name="path"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">/</field></shadow></value></block><block type="website_invalid"></block><label text="Set response data"></label><block type="website_status_code"><value name="text"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">200</field></shadow></value></block><block type="website_set_header"><value name="name"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">Content-Type</field></shadow></value><value name="value"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">text/html</field></shadow></value></block><label text="Respond"></label><block type="website_send_text"><value name="text"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">Hey!</field></shadow></value></block><block type="website_send_file"><value name="text"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">index.html</field></shadow></value></block><block type="website_send_object"></block><label text="By inv :P"></label></category>
Website Blocks.Description: Create a website connection with blocks.
